feed.title: SAP Community - SAP BW/4HANA
feed.subtitle: SAP BW/4HANA Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Regarding BW Usage Statistics Table In BW or BW4HANA
entry.content:
So, I need BW Object Usage Statistic Report so my question is simple do we have any table in BW or BW4HANA for that.
Now, From usage statistics I mean if I've 10 ADSO then what is its last use timestamp, Last changed by User, how much Content it holds, last load (Content TimeStamp ) , etc ect. 
same for like query, cube, datasource, process chain and all, so do we have anyy log files for this or we just have to go through each and every object for that.

Thank you.

entry.title: RSB4HTRF - Transfer of scenarios - Do we run it directly in Production?
entry.content:
Hello team,  

We are starting our movement from BW 7.5 (On HANA) to BW/4HANA. So far so good, we used transaction RSB4HTRF (In-place) in Sandbox to migrate couple scenarios with success, including the data was there with no problem.

I found some old discussions, stating we need to execute the transaction RSB4HTRF in each system (Dev, QA and Prod). I could not find a way to transport the process itself and not only the objects converted, which I believe will just clean up our production system.

Please, anyone did In-place migration and had experience on this part?

Thank you,

Marcelo

entry.title: BW/4 Inplace Conversion - Precheck warning - Query with SAP-Exit Variable - adjustment needed or not
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

we are currently performing the pre-checks for a BW/4HANA inplace conversion. During this process, a large number of queries are listed that use the SAP-Exit function modules of certain variables e.g. 0S_RQMRC  or 0PVAEX.

We know that 0PVAEX has a new BW/4 variable and needs to be adjusted and 0S_RQMRC is obsolete a long time ago..

The question is: Do we need to adjust these manually before switching to the B4H mode (as it is listed in the pre-.check) as the switch will be "blocked" otherwise or can we switch to the B4H mode and even convert system completely to BW/4  (assuming that the queries will no longer run if not adjusted - but adjustment then is possible in BW/4).

Thanks for clarifying.  The SAP notes are not clear on that part (at least not for me).

Best regards
Axel

entry.title: data source /US4G/0UC_MEMIDOC in S/4HANA for utilities
entry.content:
hi guys,

any experience with datasource /US4G/0UC_MEMIDOC in S/4HANA? It is activated from content, properly switched to ODP and delivers results in the source system via transaction RSA3. However, it can not be replicated in BW/4HANA, i.e., it appears not in the replication list.

Any idea how to replicate it?

Thanks!

entry.title: CDS view based CDC enabled Extractor is not working on ANLC
entry.content:
Hi Team,

In order to build a CDC enabled CDS View-based Data Extractor for ANLC table we have tried the following approaches but failed.
Is there any way available to build this, please guide?
Also, why there is such restrictions in place for enabling delta extractions?

  1. Building the CDS view on ANLC Table. It does not work. The data extraction/data pre-view also does not work. We checked few blogs and tried our luck on the view faav_anlc.
  2. Building the CDS view on faav_anlc view. The data extraction works only in full mode. The delta mode of extraction does not work with "delta.changeDataCapture.automatic : true". So, we tried with manually defining the elements.
  3. Building the CDS view by manually defining the delta elements. Using this the delta extraction fails because the view - faav_anlc has AMDP table functions and CDC does not support that.

entry.title: Range Partitioning for BW Table
entry.content:
We need to apply range partitioning for BW table .

Please let us know if it is possible and recommended to do manual partitioning for BW tables.

entry.title: BW/4HANA connection to SuccessFactors using Compoundemployee soap API instead Odata API
entry.content:
Hello Team,

W want use Compoundemployee soap API instead Odata API instead of SF Odata API to connect BW/4HANA to SuccessFactors using the DP agent.

the reason is : OdataAdapter required for SF Odata API is not supported any more to run on the DP agent and it has to run in DP server in SAP HANA Database. meantime the direct connection from SAP HANA DB to SF is not allowed and it has to be through DP agent installed in a separate machine.

the DP agent , we can use SoapAdapter and use Compoundemployee Soap API instead to extract data from SF to BW/4HANA.

Appreciate your confirmation if we can use Soap API instead of OData API please  to connect BW/4HANA to SuccessFactors through SAP Data Provisioning Agent

entry.title: Probleme SU01 Berechtigungen
entry.content:
Hallo zusammen,

folgende Situation:

Die Techniker in meinem Team sollen die SU01 nutzen können. Sie sollen dabei 03 Aktivität haben und in bestimmten Fällen, z. B. für die Erstellung eines RFC Users, dürfen sie die 02 Aktivität haben.

Nun habe ich zum Test eine Rolle erstellt, die im Menü nur die Transaktion SU01 hat. Die dabei generierten Berechtigungen habe ich zum Testen erstmal alle auf Aktivität 03 gesetzt und bestimmte Berechtigungen wie z. B. für HR gelöscht/deaktiviert. Außerdem habe ich in der Berechtigung S_USER_GRP ausschließlich die User Gruppe für RFC User hinzugefügt.

Als ich die Rolle testen wollte, hatte ich dennoch vollen Zugriff auf die SU01 und konnte auch jede andere Usergruppe bearbeiten. Die Transaktion SU01 zeigt mir innerhalb der Transaktion in einer Message-Box eine rote Error-Meldung an, dass mir die nötigen Berechtigungen fehlen, um Änderungen durchzuführen, jedoch kann ich es trotzdem machen.

Bisherige Tests:

– Ich habe meinem User alle Rollen nehmen lassen und nur diese Rolle für SU01 hinzufügen lassen. Ergebnis bleibt, dass ich bearbeiten kann.

– Mein User hat kein extra Profil oder SAP_ALL etc., nur das Profil, welches aus der Rolle für SU01 generiert wird.

-In der SU53 werden mir auch, korrekt, meine fehlenden Aktivität wie die 02 in der Berechtigung S_USER_GRP angezeigt. Wie oben beschrieben kann ich dennoch bearbeiten.

-In der SUIM habe ich über die komplexe Berechtigungsobjektsuche die Berechtigung S_USER_GRP mit der Aktivität 02 gesucht und das System hat mir die Rolle angezeigt, die ich erstellt habe und die ausschließlich die Aktivität 03 hat.

Technische Details: Mein System ist ein BW System mit der Installierten Version SAP BW/4HANA 2021 SP/FP 08 03/2024

Ich hoffe nun das jemand von euch mir dabei helfen kann.

entry.title: SAP BW Document Store // "Show document" does not work
entry.content:
I was testing the document store feature in BW/4HANA,  but when we updated our system to BW/4 2023 SPS6, the "show document" feature (see link below for SAP documentation) stopped working, and started returning a "MIME Type not supported" Error as shown in the picture below. Have anybody else experienced similar issues? If so, how did you fix this? 

Link: Creating a Document Store | SAP Help Portal

ps. I'm new to this forum so sorry in advance if this was posted with the wrong tags or in the wrong group.

entry.title: SAP partner needs a test environment of SAP BW
entry.content: Does anyone know how to get access to an SAP BW environment for testing and development?   I found this in the pricing sheet for partners but am not sure if this "bridge" is what we need.  Looking for confirmation.   Cloud test, demo, and development for SAP Datasphere, SAP BW Bridge - 8012314

entry.title: CDS view I_EQUIPMENTDATA for BW extraction: Why shouldn't it be enhanced?
entry.content:
Dear all,

I have read topic Enhance Abap CDS View I_EquipmentData. It is mentioned, that the CDS view I_EQUIPMENTDATA should not be enhanced. But I cannot find this information here: Virtual Data Model and CDS Views - Equipment Data.
It is just mentioned "This CDS view is modeled for usage as a DataSource in Business Warehouse. We recommend that you only use it for this purpose.".

Why shouldn't it be enhanced? We currently use it with "extend view I_EquipmentData with Z_E_I_EQUIPMENTDATA" and it works without problems for extracting data to our BW system..

Thanks & best regards,
Yvonne

entry.title: 0EMPLOYEE_ATTR & PA0000(CDS View) BW4HANA
entry.content:
hello All! 

Could anyone assist me? I’m creating a CompositeProvider in Eclipse for BW/4HANA modeling. I need to filter records for Transfer Postings, so I applied the MASSN code Z7 in PA0000 to extract all transfer-posting cases. To retrieve the latest updated information, I’m joining these PERNRs with PA0001, applying the filter ENDDA = 31.12.9999, so I can get the corresponding PERSK and PERSG values for the most current records.

Since the PA0001 data is available through the standard InfoObject 0EMPLOYEE_ATTR, I use that to retrieve PERSG and PERSK. However, for PA0000, I created a custom DataSource with code to extract the required MASSN-based records.

 

define view ZCDS_PA0000_Z7 as select from pa0000

 

 

{

key concat( pernr, begda )as ZCONC_KEY_UNIQUE,

 

key pernr,

key begda,

// key endda,

massn

}

 

where

 

//massn = 'Z4'

//or

massn = 'Z7'

 

Here is the rephrased version in a clear and professional way:

I mapped the start date (BEGDA) field to the standard InfoObject 0VALIDFROM.
When I run the InfoObject independently, it works fine and returns accurate results.
However, when I combine it with 0EMPLOYEE_ATTR, the output becomes incorrect for the condition ENDDA = 31.12.9999.

Whether I use a left outer join or an inner join, the issue remains the same:

  • PA0000 gives 199 records (MASSN = Z7)

  • PA0001 / 0EMPLOYEE_ATTR gives 153 updated records

  • But in the CompositeProvider, it still shows 199 records instead of 153, even though 0EMPLOYEE_ATTR should return only the updated records.

I am not sure why this mismatch is happening, since 0EMPLOYEE_ATTR is supposed to provide only the latest active record with ENDDA = 31.12.9999.

Tks.

entry.title: Dynamic table name in Select * From (Table_name)
entry.content:
Hi all,

I've created on Global Class in SE24, in which I've created the methods as per my requirements, for now I've made it statically that when I call the method it will fetch the corresponding data given in Select statment.

But I want to make it dynamic that while calling that method I can pass the table name as parameter and it will fetch the records for that corresponding table. So, is it possible to do it this way or there is any other way around that im missing?

Thanks.

entry.title: How to prevent BW/4HANA process chains from running when EDP pipeline fails?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

We have an external data processing (EDP) pipeline that feeds data into BW/4HANA. Currently, BW process chains run on a schedule, but we need to ensure that if the EDP pipeline fails, BW loads do not start.

What is the best approach to implement this dependency?

  • Should we use a control table or event-based triggering?
  • How can EDP communicate its success/failure status to BW/4HANA?
  • Any recommended best practices or SAP-supported patterns for this scenario?

Our goal is to avoid partial or incorrect loads in BW when upstream data is incomplete.

Thanks in advance for your guidance!

SAP BW/4HANA #EDP

entry.title: Error in OData call made with self sign certificate
entry.content:
Hello All,

We want to establish a connection between a Python and SAP through OData call. For this, we are using a self signed X.509 certificate which we generated using OpenSSL. 

when we make a Odata call [which is based on a BW query], we are getting a 404 error with description : Please select a valid URL. If it is a valid URL, check whether service /sap/opu/odata/sap/<service_name>/$metadata is active in transaction SICF. 

we have set the odata Logon detail to SSL Certificate.

could you tell where we could be going wrong and how we can fix it?

OData SAP BW/4HANA Python

entry.title: Function Module Based Generic Extractor
entry.content:
I've one FM Based extractor and  Its running okie but there is one extra package coming, and because of that the first package is not coming in final output.

for example, I'm extracting 10 packages, each package is containing 100 records and function module is extracting 11 packages,

so the initial package 0-100 records are missing and in last package instead of getting 900-1000 recordd im getting 11th package which contains 1000-1100.

and I guess the problem is in closing the coursor, can anyone help me on this one, when done hard code like suppose ive one variable "lv_datapackage"( value is fetched from memory )  which will itrate from 1 to 10 and once its ten it will close the cursor, but as i said its "HARDCODE" I want to make it dynamic. 

 

Thank you
